intro: Watch your beautiful garden grow, dye fabrics, and turn them into beautiful clothing.
description:
Create, farm, and style your way to success in Cottonville!
Welcome to Cottonville – a cozy dress-up and farming sim where creativity blossoms and fashion takes root! Run your own sewing atelier, grow essential crops, and craft stylish outfits for a charming cast of characters.


A Fresh Start in Cottonville
After leaving the hustle of Friglight, you arrive in peaceful Cottonville to take over a small family sewing shop. Start fresh, grow your business, and build a new life—one stitch at a time.


Customize Your Character
Express yourself! Choose from 18 hair colors, 15 hairstyles, and a variety of eye shapes, mouths, lashes, eyebrows, and skin tones. Dress your character in a wide range of outfits that grow with your fashion journey.


From Farming to Fashion
Cultivate cotton, linen, and bamboo—then harvest natural dyes from flowers to create fabrics in 7 vibrant colors. Craft materials, unlock new sewing patterns, and design custom outfits that reflect your unique style.


Run Your Atelier
Take charge of your boutique with over 60 sewing patterns and 120+ total clothing variations. Listen to customer requests, mix and match fabrics, and tailor outfits that reflect their personalities—from winter sweaters to breezy summer styles.


Features:
- 60+ sewing patterns with multiple color variants (120+ total!)
- 3 farmable crops and 7 dye colors to craft your own fabrics
- Fully customizable character with a wide selection of features
- A charming story about starting over and finding creativity in a cozy town
- Unique customers and outfit requests that evolve with your boutique
- Dive into 60+ hours of fashion-filled farming and storytelling!


Grow crops, craft clothes, and chase your fashion dreams—Cottonville awaits you!
